name: Reaper's Garden
description:
w, a, s, d to move
left click to slash (slash 3 in a row to do a more substantial 3rd hit)
right click to dash (dodge)
space to use an item
scroll to change the item
e to interact

------------------------

You play as the reaper who has the task of harvesting the dead souls so that they can move on. But going and harvesting each soul individually is too slow, so the reaper lets them group up by type, creating the 7 bosses.

You can grow your garden to get upgrades for later bosses. Each plant has its own soul cost, use, and growth time measured in the stage.

Grow your garden and harvest the souls of the dead.

------------------------

The game is very not complete : )
2 out of the 7 bosses are not functionally implemented and there is no win screen. Plus other problems and sprite issues. Have fun!
